Title: XGate2D - XNA 2D Game Engine
Description:
XGate2D is 2D game engine built using XNA Framework. 
XGate2D currently has 8 features: input handler, animation, Graphical User Interface (GUI), collision detection, physics, particle system, tiling engine, and audio engine.

Project Description
